name: Silence (itch) (Trickbag Games)
description:
A first person Independent horror game made over two days. 

Escape a unknown hostile environment by using strategy, and timing to evade

the hostile spirits plaguing the areas around you.

Tips:

There are two types of spirits.

The deaf and the blind.

The deaf can't hear you but they can see you. Make sure to turn off your light when you hear them near. Use quick bursts of light to get through the environment.

The blind cannot see you but they are very sensitive to every sound you make. Be sure to manage the amount of sound you make.

Every locked door has a key find them all to escape.

Let me know of any bugs you might find and I will fix them asap.
